I urge @realDonaldTrump to go back to steadily increasing pressure on the Iranian regime and to finally tear up the catastrophic Obama-Iran nuclear deal.

Including today’s decision to establish a new & untested financial mechanism to facilitate trade w Iran beyond the critically important & existing humanitarian exemptions the US has established to ensure the Iranian people are shielded from our sanctions against the Ayatollahs.
